title: Demetagoda, opposite St. Anthony's Church
details:
High residential area in the heart of Colombo.
Very wide area facing to the road.
Easy access to anywhere and nearby to schools, commercial area, hospitals, market, all religious houses, etc.
Ideal location for school, hospital, apartment, etc.
Upcoming commercial properties nearby the location.
Very high demand area.
Only potential, interested and serious buyers and please no brokers.
Price negotiable after inspection.
